event_text: m_c was killed by a falling branch during a battle in a heavily wooded area of the forest.

history.reg_death: m_c was crushed by a falling branch.

event_text: m_c was found dead underneath an oak tree with dog scent wreathing around {PRONOUN/m_c/object}.

history.reg_death: m_c fell out of a tree while trying to escape from a dog.
history.lead_death: fell out of a tree while trying to escape a dog

event_text: m_c was crushed when a tree fell into camp.

history.reg_death: m_c was crushed by a falling tree.

event_text: m_c was carried off by an owl, never to be seen again.

history.reg_death: m_c was carried away by an owl.

event_text: r_c, guarding camp, yowls a warning as {PRONOUN/r_c/subject} {VERB/r_c/spot/spots} a circling shadow, right above m_c. r_c starts sprinting to m_c's position but can't get there in time, not before m_c is carried high into the sky by a rook.

history.reg_death: m_c was grabbed by a rook, never to be seen again.

event_text: A hawk swoops over camp, its brown wings piercing the sky. The hawk lowers, its talons snatching up m_c and flies away, m_c had been its prey.

history.reg_death: m_c was taken by a hawk, never to be seen again.

event_text: Pure joy was in {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} eyes as {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} {VERB/m_c/sneak/sneaks} out of camp- {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} didnt want to play with the others, and a patrol finds {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} bloodied body, fox scent rancid on {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} pelt.

history.reg_death: m_c was eaten by a fox after {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} tried to sneak out of camp.

event_text: m_c eagerly climbs a tree, {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} claws digging into the hard bark. Suddenly, one of {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} claws give way and in shock, {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} {VERB/m_c/let/lets} go of the branch with {pronoun/m_c/poss} other claws. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} {VERB/m_c/plummet/plummets} to the ground, {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} neck snapping. At least {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} died painlessly.

history.reg_death: m_c fell from a tree and died.

event_text: m_c has been missing for a while. Its only a few hours later that a patrol finds m_c's lifeless body floating lazily in the water.
